general: Dear Libra, today, the Moon in Pisces influences your emotions and intuition, while it aligns with Uranus, Saturn, and Neptune before moving into Aries. This cosmic movement encourages you to act boldly and make decisions that could transform your life. You possess the strength within you to overcome the challenges ahead. With Mars entering Aquarius, your motivation and creativity will be stimulated in the coming weeks. It is the perfect time to pursue your passions and let your imagination run free. Enjoy moments of closeness and romantic exchanges as Mercury and Venus harmonize later in the day.
love: Dare to express your feelings, magic is in the air.
work: Do not be afraid to take bold initiatives at work.
health: Take time to relax and recharge.
advice: Trust your intuition, it guides you.
teaser: Will you dare to transform your life today?
